com.complexible.stardog.api.versioning

Interface VersioningConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Connection

    public interface VersioningConnection
extends Connection

    Extends the standard Connection exposing the versioning support.

    Since:
    2.2
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    Evren Sirin

    • Method Detail

      • commit

        UUID commit(String theMessage)
     throws StardogException
        Commits the current transaction and attaches the given message to the version metadata. Returns the ID of the new Version
        Throws:
        StardogException

      • revert

        void revert(Version theFromVersion,
            Version theToVersion,
            String theMessage)
     throws StardogException
        Reverts all the changes committed between theFromVersion (exclusive) and theToVersion (inclusive) as a new commit with the given message. The changes committed in theFromVersion will remain in the database. but the changes in theToVersion (and any other commit in between) will be reverted. The revert will be done as a single transaction so either all commits in the range wil lbe reverted or no changes will be committed. This function does not perform any conflict resolution and simply applies the corresponding diff in the reverse. All the additions specified in the given range will be removed and all the removals in the given range will be added.
        Throws:
        StardogException - if there is an error reverting the commits

      • versions

        Versions versions()
        Returns the versions in this database.

      • tags

        Tags tags()
        Returns the tags in this database.

      • getVersioningMetadata

        VersioningMetadata getVersioningMetadata()
        Returns the versioning metadata query interface.
